FasigTiptonUpdates.Update: 250 PH23 FTFEB FT FEB MIXED 21 update on line 35: + LIL MO GOLD, by Uncle Mo. Placed at 3, $14,050. Sent from United States to Saudi Arabia in 2022. Half-sister to **LADY OF SHAMROCK** ($950,400, 1st American Oaks S. **[G1]** (BHP, $210,000), etc.), **SMOOTH JAZZ** ($321,105, 1st Commonwealth Breeders' Cup S. **[G2]** (KEE, $169,725), etc., sire), **SHE'S SENSATIONAL** ($174,540, 1st Alameda County H. (PLN, $30,700), etc.), **Favorite Uncle** ($94,864, 3rd Golden Circle S. (PRM, $6,000)). Dam of 3 foals, 1 to race--
